protein.general_function: Involved in hydrolase activity, acting on ester bonds
protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the deacetylation of N-acetylaspartic acid (NAA) to produce acetate and L-aspartate. NAA occurs in high concentration in brain and its hydrolysis NAA plays a significant part in the maintenance of intact white matter. In other tissues it act as a scavenger of NAA from body fluids.

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on ester bonds
hydrolase activity, acting on ester bonds
